title: Horrible placing?
body:
Hello, first I would like to tell you that I was in bronze 4 last season. This season me and a friend duo queued our 10 placement matches, I got bronze 4 again, he got bronze 1.. that doesn't seem to be very fair (since I carried him through, duo bot lane), I had just finished grieving but today when I had to do another placement match because the mmr was 'fixed' I was but into games vs bronzes and low silver and it seemed all good. But the thing is that I was place into BRONZE 5 after WINNING the 11th placement match. I won 6/10 = Bronze 4 for me and bronze 1 for friend. then 7/11 = Bronze 5 for me bronze 1 for friend???
IGN: Maskedsora
Friend Ign: Jimny99
 Riot please fix this, i'm sad.

replies.body:
It sucks, and I can understand your frustration, but you'll need a little context on this.

Basically, upon the release of flex queue, seeding and matchmaking was completely messed up. The result was Diamond players being placed in Gold and below, and Bronze/Silver players being placed in Gold+ (and everything in between.

You were one of the lucky ones that hasn't had your rank drastically changed, your friend (assuming he was also B4 last season) will more than likely drop to B5 as well.

Basically, the original placements were hella messed up and unfair all around, so there was one more placement with a reset that put you where you should be after a set of placements (i.e typically a little lower than your end of season rank).

You can find more context here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks
